member.name: T:Ninject.Extensions.Azure.Clients.AzureClientsModule
member.summary: Module that sets up all the bindings the extension needs. It will only bind types that have not yet been bound. Recommend that you load it last.

member.name: T:Ninject.Extensions.Azure.Clients.ClientFactory
member.summary: Default implementation of .

member.summary: Definition of the factory.

member.name: M:Ninject.Extensions.Azure.Clients.ICreateClientsAsync.CreateStorageQueueClientAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a cloud queue (Azure Storage Queue) given the queue name.

member.name: M:Ninject.Extensions.Azure.Clients.ICreateClientsAsync.CreateServicebusQueueClientAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a queue client (Azure Service Bus Queue) given the queue name.

member.name: M:Ninject.Extensions.Azure.Clients.ICreateClientsAsync.CreateTopicClientAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a topic client (Azure Service Bus Topic) given the topic name.

member.name: M:Ninject.Extensions.Azure.Clients.ICreateClientsAsync.CreateSubscriptionClientAsync(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a subscription client (Azure Service Bus Topic) given the topic and subscription name.
